root.name: Championship Manager 2007
root.description: Championship Manager '07 is a remake of Eidos' Championship Manager series of computer games. Â FeaturesWith the normal seasonal data updates that reflect palyer movements and competition outcomes, this version also saw many new features.2 new divisions for the English leagues- Conference North and Conference SouthUp-to-date player statistics for each clubfor the PSP, staff feedback on team selection and team talksMatch Analysis tool was added to the game, including stats for each team and its players at the end of a match
